definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be smeared over, blinded (Aram. [[שְׁעַע]] smear (akin to [[שׁוּעַ]] id.), 0a4a9 to smooth, [[שָׁעִיעַ]] smooth (of words), flattering, 4a9iy9 smooth (cf. also 4o9, 4a9 smear over, close up);—

definitions.title: Hithpalp.
definitions.body: Imv. mpl. [[הִשְׁתַּעַשְׁעוּ וׇשָׁׂעוּ]] Is 29:9 blind yourselves and be blind ! (‖[[הִתְמַהְמְהוּ וּתְמָהוּ ]]); > Buhl [[הִשְׁתָּעוּ וּשְׁעוּ]], √[[שׁעה]] look about (2Sa 22:42); Is 32:3 rd. prob. 3 fpl. [[תְּשׁׂעֶינׇה]], of eyes, be blinded (v. [[שׁעה]]).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Imv. ms. [[וְעֵינׇיו הָשַָׁע]] Is 6:10 and its eyes besmear !—So perhaps [[הָשַׁע]] Ps 39:14 ([[עֵינֶיךָ]] om.) was intended by Mas. (but wrongly, v. Ol al.); see [[שָׁעָה]]. p. 1043
